member.name: Windows.CreateDispatcherQueueController
member.summary: Creates a DispatcherQueueController. Use the created DispatcherQueueController to create and manage the lifetime of a DispatcherQueue to run queued tasks in priority order on the dispatcher queue's thread.
member.param: The threading affinity and type of COM apartment for the created DispatcherQueueController. See remarks for details.

param.name: dispatcherQueueController
param.div: Important The DispatcherQueueController is a WinRT object.

member.returns: S_OK for success; otherwise a failure code.
